mapper.select: SELECT a.* --lpad(' ', (lv-1)*4, ' ') || a.title as title FROM (SELECT a.*, ROWNUM rn FROM (SELECT board.*, LEVEL lv FROM board START WITH categoryNo = #{categoryNo} AND pboardno=0 CONNECT BY PRIOR boardno = pboardno AND categoryNo = #{categoryNo} ORDER SIBLINGS BY ord, boardNo DESC ) a ) a WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{page}-1)*#{pageSize} +1 AND (#{page}*#{pageSize})
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, regDt = sysdate WHERE boardNo = #{boardNo}
UPDATE board SET delYn = 'Y', regDt = sysdate WHERE boardNo = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: select seq_board.nextval from dual INSERT INTO board (boardNo, pBoardno, categoryNo, title, content, delYn, ord, readCnt, regId, regDt) VALUES (#{boardNo}, #{pboardNo}, #{categoryNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{delYn}, #{ord}, #{readCnt}, #{regId}, sysdate)
INSERT INTO boardFile (fileNo, boardNo, fileOrgNm, fileNm, filePath, fileType, fileSize) VALUES (seq_boardfile.nextVal, #{boardNo}, #{fileOrgNm}, #{fileNm}, #{filePath}, #{fileType}, #{fileSize})

SELECT SEQ_BOARD_REP.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO boardRep (repno, boardno, content, delyn, regid, regdt) VALUES (#{repNo}, #{boardNo}, #{content}, #{delYn}, #{regId}, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE boardRep set delYn ='Y' WHERE repNo = #{repNo}
UPDATE boardRep set content = #{content} WHERE repNo = #{repNo}
